masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone stole my backpack at the bus stop. I know you deal with big stuff but... my mom's in the hospital. The only present I could afford was in that bag—I saved up for months. It's a locket with our family photo. Please. She's gonna be alone on Christmas."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track down whoever took Miguel's backpack
  • Recover the locket—it's irreplaceable
  • Get it to the hospital in time for Christmas morning
